== ao:body ==

|| _*ao:hasTopic*_ || The _ao:hasTopic_ property links a URI as topic of the annotation. While ao:body is linking a textual/hypertextual or semi-structured document, ao:hasTopic is linking structured or semantically specified resources.||

Examples of entities targeted by the _ao:hasTopic_ relationship are: URIs of terms from controlled vocabularies and ontologies, URIs of entities specified in structured knowledge bases.
